## 01 - basic ggplot



::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
#install.packages("palmerpenguins")
#library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy, colour = class)) + 
  geom_point()
```

::: {.cell-output-display}
![](index_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){width=672}
:::
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
library(palmerpenguins)
ggplot(penguins, aes(bill_length_mm, flipper_length_mm, colour = species)) + 
  geom_point()
```
